name: Process Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

• Participating in reviews and formulation of technical solutions for the Client in part of Technologies, Process Engineering, Design Basis, Scope of Work, Initial Data, Kick-off Meeting

• Assist clients towards feasible options and manage expectations

• Analyzing of Petrochemistry, Gas processing, Water treatment technologies

• Licensor evaluation and selection

• Process configuration and optimization for best practices and innovative solutions which could improve production and quality rates

• EPFCM, EPC Pre-contract activities, ITB, Preparing estimates and price comparisons (PDP, FEED, PD, Detail engineering Subcontractors), Contract manager work

• Formulating, check-up and analyze capital expenditures and project designs

• Scheduling and coordinating work to deadlines and within financial budgets

• Preparing project timely reporting to project management: follow-up the activity, critical deviations of activities and/or potential risks

• Contribute to get Client’s approval of technical documents

• Check and monitor Issue quality within the project

• Management, review and coordination of Project Design Documentation, Process Documentation, P&IDs

• Equipment lists, Piping Systems & Equipment: Sizing & Operation, Datasheets review

• U&IO, Gathering & Distribution Systems Design - Flow Assurance

• Checking of relief system design, flare hydraulics and radiation

• Preparation DRC, ADRC, comments to project documentation

• Participation in 3D model review

• Safety, environmental and operability reviews (HAZOP, ENVID, SIL)

• Technical Requirements to DCS control System

• Assist with Client/Licensor/Subcontractor coordination for the startup of completed systems.

• Provide training program and materials for Process Operators

• Assist in the development and execution of commissioning and startup plans

• Assisting in achieving Guaranteed Performance of the Process Units

Требования:

  • опыт работы от 5 лет
  • знание английского языка
Условия:
  • Оформление по ТК РФ
  • Белая заработная плата
  • Работа в мультинациональной команде
  • Вкусная китайская еда от нашего замечательного повара
  • Чай, кофе и вкусняшки целый день, но не в ущерб работе
